channel.title: What is MAGIC?
channel.description:
Someone who isn't me read in a newspaper article about a book that told a story of someone who did Magic.
Said person reading said newspaper article on said book believes that Magic is pure MDMA + Heroin?
Does anyone who is not you know whether this is confirmable or deniable?
As someone who isn't me and isn't related to me or isn't friends with me read a book about buying 7grams of it and is wondering based upon the, reportedly stated colour being almost milk chocolate like.
The person from the above story in the fore mentioned article read by SWIM would be be grateful for info.

item.title: What is MAGIC?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Personally I would consider magic to be a psychedelic. There’s a lot more magic going on then just feeling good.

Stepping outside on a nice day on 4 grams of cubes, and having a smoke. That’s my magic.

Mushrooms + mdma… Had a bad experience, but a good one too.

Read full topic

item.title: What is MAGIC?
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

MDMA is frigging magic on its own xD but i have no clue what the second ingredient is. maybe somewhere like “talktofrank” would have the answer?

Read full topic

item.title: What is MAGIC?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:5, topic:268437”]im sure “magic” has been used as a slang term for a shitload of different drugs over the years

get a testkit candyman[/quote]
i know its some form of MDMA, I don’t know if there is another ingredient

Read full topic

item.title: What is MAGIC?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Honestly no one here is going to have an answer for you on that one. Not on this forum.

My cat phoned me and said SWIY MUST DIE

Read full topic

item.title: What is MAGIC?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

chrisn2323:

wtf is this SWIM shit. I see it all the time and it looks gay.

Ollie:

Someone who isn’t me

Also don’t post if you don’t have any relevant information k? This is a questions forum, you are supposed to reply with answers.

Read full topic
